languages.text: "Пусть варп-ветра гонят твою ладью быстро, Вольный Торговец! И да не ускользнет от тебя истина".
"May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."
languages.original_text: "Пусть варп-ветра гонят твою ладью быстро, Вольный Торговец! И да не ускользнет от тебя истина".

traits.locale_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: “原亚空间的狂风吹着你的撞角长船前进，行商浪人！愿真相不会从你手中逃脱。”
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."

traits.locale_text: “原亚空间的狂风吹着你的撞角长船前进，行商浪人！愿真相不会从你手中逃脱。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: « Que les vents du Warp soient favorables à votre drekkar, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Puissiez-vous mettre la main sur la vérité que vous cherchez. »
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."

traits.locale_text: « Que les vents du Warp soient favorables à votre drekkar, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Puissiez-vous mettre la main sur la vérité que vous cherchez. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「〈歪み〉航行の風がお前のドレッカールに安全な航海をもたらすことを祈ろう、自由開拓者よ！そして、その手が真実を掴むことも祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."

traits.locale_text: 「〈歪み〉航行の風がお前のドレッカールに安全な航海をもたらすことを祈ろう、自由開拓者よ！そして、その手が真実を掴むことも祈ろう」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «¡Que los vientos de la disformidad dirijan tu drekkar con presteza, Comerciante Independiente! Y que la verdad no se escape de tus garras».
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que los vientos de la disformidad dirijan tu drekkar con presteza, Comerciante Independiente! Y que la verdad no se escape de tus garras».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Mögen die Winde des Warps Euren Drekkar schnell antreiben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Und möge die Wahrheit Eurem Griff nicht entkommen."
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."

traits.locale_text: "Mögen die Winde des Warps Euren Drekkar schnell antreiben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Und möge die Wahrheit Eurem Griff nicht entkommen."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Öteboyutun rüzgârlarıyla drekkarın tez zamanda gitsin Hür Tacir! Umarım hakikat, senin pençelerinden kaçamaz."
languages.original_text: "May the winds of the warp drive your drekkar swiftly, Rogue Trader! And may the truth not escape your grip."
